title: Unable to connect to the login queue
body: Can't login as of this morning. Linked a screenshot to the problem, and also typed it in the title.

replies.body: I'm seeing a good amount of these login issues that popped up around 3 hours ago, but so far most seem to have been fixed by now. Definitely let me know if you're still having problems, as this might be some kind of packet loss issue.

Ya im having the same issue starting this morning as well.

I ran full repair and i was able to login, so give that a try and see if it works for you.
